humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, sentinel lymph node #3 is positive for metastatic lobular carcinoma (1/1). Based on the new rules provided, N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The N stage for this patient is N1 because there is metastatic carcinoma present in one sentinel lymph node (1/4). This is supported by the pathology report, which states 'Sentinel lymph node #3, Left Axilla, Excision: - One lymph node, positive for metastatic lobular carcinoma (1/1).' The report also mentions that the other sentinel lymph nodes were negative for metastatic carcinoma.
